languages.text: Тысячи верующих стекаются на Фолстоун в надежде послужить Императору. Их энергию можно направить на колонизацию и завоевание новых миров, как заповедовал святой Друз. Строительство паломнических ковчегов потребует огромных ресурсов, но богатства — ничто для истинно верующего.

Thousands of believers are flocking to Foulstone in the hope of serving the Emperor. Their energy can be directed toward the colonisation and conquest of new worlds, as commanded by Saint Drusus. The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.
languages.original_text: Тысячи верующих стекаются на Фолстоун в надежде послужить Императору. Их энергию можно направить на колонизацию и завоевание новых миров, как заповедовал святой Друз. Строительство паломнических ковчегов потребует огромных ресурсов, но богатства — ничто для истинно верующего.

traits.locale_text: Thousands of believers are flocking to Foulstone in the hope of serving the Emperor. Their energy can be directed towards the colonisation and conquest of new worlds, as commanded by Saint Drusus. The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.

The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.

The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.

The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.

Thousands of believers are flocking to Foulstone in the hope of serving the Emperor. Their energy can be directed toward the colonisation and conquest of new worlds, as commanded by Saint Drusus. The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.

languages.text: Miles de creyentes acuden a Rocainmunda con esperanzas de servir al Emperador. Su energía puede dirigirse a la colonización y conquista de nuevos mundos como ordenó san Drusus. La construcción de las arcas de los peregrinos exigirá cantidades ingentes de recompensas, pero la riqueza no es nada para un verdadero creyente.
languages.original_text: Thousands of believers are flocking to Foulstone in the hope of serving the Emperor. Their energy can be directed toward the colonisation and conquest of new worlds, as commanded by Saint Drusus. The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.

traits.locale_text: Miles de creyentes acuden a Rocainmunda con esperanzas de servir al Emperador. Su energía puede dirigirse a la colonización y conquista de nuevos mundos como ordenó san Drusus. La construcción de las arcas de los peregrinos exigirá cantidades ingentes de recompensas, pero la riqueza no es nada para un verdadero creyente.

languages.text: Des milliers de croyants désireux de servir l'Empereur affluent sur Rochepeste. Leur énergie pourrait être consacrée à la colonisation et à la conquête de nouveaux mondes, comme l'a ordonné Saint Drusus. La construction d'arches de pèlerinage engloutira d'énormes quantités de ressources, mais la richesse matérielle n'est rien aux yeux des fidèles.
languages.original_text: Thousands of believers are flocking to Foulstone in the hope of serving the Emperor. Their energy can be directed toward the colonisation and conquest of new worlds, as commanded by Saint Drusus. The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.

traits.locale_text: Des milliers de croyants désireux de servir l'Empereur affluent sur Rochepeste. Leur énergie pourrait être consacrée à la colonisation et à la conquête de nouveaux mondes, comme l'a ordonné Saint Drusus. La construction d'arches de pèlerinage engloutira d'énormes quantités de ressources, mais la richesse matérielle n'est rien aux yeux des fidèles.

languages.text: 成千上万的信徒怀着侍奉神皇的宏愿涌向荒寂岩地。正如圣德鲁苏斯所示，他们的能量可以直接用于殖民和征服新的世界。建造朝圣方舟需要花费大量的资源，但对于真正忠诚的信徒来说，金钱乃是身外之物。
languages.original_text: Thousands of believers are flocking to Foulstone in the hope of serving the Emperor. Their energy can be directed toward the colonisation and conquest of new worlds, as commanded by Saint Drusus. The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.

traits.locale_text: 成千上万的信徒怀着侍奉神皇的宏愿涌向荒寂岩地。正如圣德鲁苏斯所示，他们的能量可以直接用于殖民和征服新的世界。建造朝圣方舟需要花费大量的资源，但对于真正忠诚的信徒来说，金钱乃是身外之物。

languages.text: 何千人もの信者が、皇帝に仕えることを望んでファウルストーンに集まっている。彼らのエネルギーは、聖ドルススによって命じられた新世界の植民地化と征服によるものだ。巡礼者の箱舟の建設には莫大な資源が必要だが、真の信者にとって富は何ら必要としないものなのだ。
languages.original_text: Thousands of believers are flocking to Foulstone in the hope of serving the Emperor. Their energy can be directed toward the colonisation and conquest of new worlds, as commanded by Saint Drusus. The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.

traits.locale_text: 何千人もの信者が、皇帝に仕えることを望んでファウルストーンに集まっている。彼らのエネルギーは、聖ドルススによって命じられた新世界の植民地化と征服によるものだ。巡礼者の箱舟の建設には莫大な資源が必要だが、真の信者にとって富は何ら必要としないものなのだ。

languages.text: Tausende von Gläubigen strömen in der Hoffnung nach Foulstone, dem Imperator dienen zu dürfen. Ihre Energie lässt sich für die Kolonisierung und Eroberung neuer Welten dienen, wie vom Heiligen Drusus befohlen. Der Bau von Pilgerarchen wird gewaltige Ressourcen erfordern, doch für den wahren Gläubigen ist Reichtum nicht von Bedeutung.
languages.original_text: Thousands of believers are flocking to Foulstone in the hope of serving the Emperor. Their energy can be directed toward the colonisation and conquest of new worlds, as commanded by Saint Drusus. The construction of pilgrims' arks will require enormous resources, but wealth is nothing to the true believer.

Ihre Energie lässt sich für die Kolonisierung und Eroberung neuer Welten dienen, wie vom Heiligen Drusus befohlen. Der Bau von Pilgerarchen wird gewaltige Ressourcen erfordern, doch für den wahren Gläubigen ist Reichtum nicht von Bedeutung.
